outputs.output_descr: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant (PPG) is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in the Climate Change focal area addressing barriers to help ensure that energy efficiency best practices are carried out in the construction of new residential buildings in Belarus, reducing energy consumption in new residential buildings by on average at least 70% when compared to the existing building stock.

project_descr: Project Preparatory Grant Title: Improving Energy Efficiency in New Residential Buildings in the Republic of Belarus
project_title: Project Preparatory Grant:Energy Efficiency in Buildings
